images.description: An array with a single item: a single Image ID matched from context that is most relevant, or 0 if none available

titles.description: An array with a single item: Summarized or rephrased title from the text context

texts.description: Summarized or rephrased text information. There can be as many string elements as it needs to be here.

questions.description: Up to 6 relevant questions based on the texts
